title: Independent launches travel awards
text:
Save 
The Independent newspaper has launched its own travel awards. 
Holidaymakers will be able to nominate their favourite travel companies between August 15 and September 11 before a judging panel judging panel, which includes TTG’s editor Pippa Jacks, sifts through a shortlist. 
Winners will be announced during a ceremony at the Corinthia Hotel in central London on October 7 with 14 awards presented on the night. 
Simon Calder, travel correspondent at The Independent, said: “We look forward to reading nominations that will give our judging panel plenty to think about to ensure we’re celebrating the very best in travel.”
